body: One of the best ntr before but the ending was so-so

@Stasis Hunter Agreed, I left a whole review in the final volume of this series with the English translation giving all my thoughts. The story was really in depth and the ntr was used to move the story forward with some interesting character interactions and development. All the characters had layers to them, and none of them were caricatures or just one note.
They dont make ntr stories like this anymore lol
